basic_info.title: SIIT Graduate Scholarship 2025 in Thailand (Fully Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed

financial_coverage: Living Allowance of 10,000 baht Per Month for master students and 15,000 baht for Doctoral students.
Visa Fee, Airport Taxes, up to 10,000 Baht will be given.
Round Trip Airfare Tickets (Economy Class) Direct Route to Thailand.
Health & Accident Insurance will be provided during the Scholarship.

required_documents: A statement of purpose (At least one page of a statement of purpose)
An official transcript or current transcript.
Bachelor’s degree transcript with at least a GPA. 2.75
Bachelor’s degree transcript, and Master’s degree transcript with GPA. 3.50
Research paper, publication, or certificates (if any)
Recent photograph (1 x 1.5 inches size as jpeg. only)
Certificate of English proficiency test as one as follows (if any):
application_process: Click on the SIIT Graduate Scholarship Program
Make an account first. Then login.
